    $value[0]['blog_detail']
    <p><img style="height: auto;" src="https://devigntech.com/adminpanel/images/ecommerce%20website%20cost%20india.jpg" alt="ecommerce website cost India article"></p>
<p>So you’re an entrepreneur looking to debut online? Do you have a business and want to sell your products online? Then, my friend, you need to have a clear picture of how much it will cost.</p>
<p>There’s no need to panic. This article will clear all your doubts and give an estimated cost of your eCommerce website in India.</p>
<p>Let’s get started. You need to understand the major factors that <strong>impact your ecommerce website cost</strong>.</p>
<p>Everybody shops online and you now have options to sell online too. So eCommerce isn’t a riddle that only a few can solve.</p>
<p>Your peers might have told you that eCommerce is tough, getting customers will be a pain, the logistics are a headache and much more.</p>
<p>On one hand, they might be right.</p>
<p>Building an eCommerce website is no child’s play and that’s why <a href="https://www.sba.gov/sites/default/files/advocacy/Frequently-Asked-Questions-Small-Business-2018.pdf" aria-invalid="true"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">22%</span></a> of eCommerce businesses fail every year. There are a ton of things to consider and you need to have an idea of how much you can spend.</p>
<p>Having a vague idea won’t help so I have come up with an estimate that suits your business needs. This estimate is close to the accurate prices in the market now so that it doesn’t go beyond your budget.</p>
<p>Let me break down each component one by one.</p>
<h2>Ecommerce Website Cost Breakdown</h2>
<p>Millions of eCommerce websites are made every year. Some fail. Others make a decent profit while a handful makes hundreds, if not thousands of dollars every day.</p>
<p>The nine components here sums up the entire cost of an eCommerce website in India. All the factors are essential for every eCommerce website and their costs are close to recent estimates. Let’s go through one by one:</p>
<ol>
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;"><strong><a href="https://devigntech.com/blog/ecommerce-website-cost#Business%20Logo">Business Logo</a></strong></li>
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;"><strong><a href="https://devigntech.com/blog/ecommerce-website-cost#Domain%20Name">Domain Name</a></strong></li>
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;"><strong><a href="https://devigntech.com/blog/ecommerce-website-cost#Hosting%20Service">Hosting Service</a></strong></li>
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;"><strong><a href="https://devigntech.com/blog/ecommerce-website-cost#Professional%20eCommerce%20Photography">Professional Photography</a></strong></li>
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;"><strong><a href="https://devigntech.com/blog/ecommerce-website-cost#Web%20Design">Web Design</a></strong></li>
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;"><strong><a href="https://devigntech.com/blog/ecommerce-website-cost#Payment%20Gateway%20Integration">Payment gateway integration</a></strong></li>
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;"><strong><a href="https://devigntech.com/blog/ecommerce-website-cost#Logistics%20Service">Logistics service</a></strong></li>
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;"><strong><a href="https://devigntech.com/blog/ecommerce-website-cost#Messaging%20Service">Messaging service</a></strong></li>
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;"><strong><a href="https://devigntech.com/blog/ecommerce-website-cost#Maintaining%20Cost">Maintaining cost</a></strong></li>
</ol>
<p><img src="https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/HmqWn0VftUFBQvVcPszUJBBE0LgcqvjTVyfQzx6WdiFWnrwVCpFHPobf0XmNx4HJjpzrLXjbvFPeauykoI8mJK6boAtQt63JmhZEvRtd-Th3Kd_5bqufvhinjiuG5QrDDeBkbg8O=s1600"></p>
<ol>
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<h2><a id="Business Logo" name="Business Logo"></a>Business Logo</h2>
</li>
</ol>
<p>The logo obviously comes first.</p>
<p>Did you know that <a href="https://www.businessinsider.in/twitters-first-logo-cost-less-than-20/articleshow/39966162.cms"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">Twitter’s logo cost only $15</span></a>? Can you get your logo designed for that price now? Of course, you can!</p>
<p>In fact, you can design it for free with an online logo designer. I don’t recommend that because it will be just an “image” and not represent your business.</p>
<p>A few thousand rupees is a small portion of your eCommerce website cost. Hire a logo designer and they can craft the right logo for your business.</p>
<p>The right bandwidth to spend would be around <strong>?2000 to ?10,000</strong> for your brand’s logo. A good deal would be to negotiate for a logo package where you get the logo in different dimensions.</p>
<ol start="2">
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<h2><a id="Domain Name" name="Domain Name"></a>Domain Name</h2>
</li>
</ol>
<p>The right domain name helps people to recognize your business easier. Choose a domain name that represents your business, simple and unique.</p>
<p>The domain name comes with a wide range of options. For eCommerce websites in India, .com, .store, and .shop are the most suited extensions.</p>
<p>The price band could be between <strong>?1000 and ?1500</strong> a year. You can buy the domain name at affordable prices. I searched for a domain name for a flower shop and here are suggestions from Reseller Club India:</p>
<p><img src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/axUSBsfglyYDwJ5zjJ-ZIBwc0dhq4hjc-VWXHuXn3CVRGAvTbZqrgoQPUlcSX6TMmdcPDa0YvNGfWUo7-nUbWU-AvsbeDBK707R0PB4ZG5pfTCoVovCz8EHSYMyk0x-_6OXNVBpd=s1600"></p>
<p><a href="https://www.namecheap.com/domains/"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">Namecheap</span></a> is a good choice to buy your domain name. The best part is they offer an SSL certificate which is essential for any eCommerce website.</p>
<p><strong>Pro-tip</strong>: Keep the name short and try to add a keyword. The name should be self-explanatory and people should identify what kind of business you are. </p>
<ol start="3">
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<h2><a id="Hosting Service" name="Hosting Service"></a>Hosting Service</h2>
</li>
</ol>
<p>Amazon would lose around <a href="https://www.gremlin.com/ecommerce-cost-of-downtime/?_ga=2.121879819.1055670172.1634384963-1060424576.1634384961"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">$220,318.80 per minute</span></a> if it goes down. You cannot turn a blind eye when it comes to hosting your first eCommerce website.</p>
<p>Here are the different hosting plans that <a href="https://www.hostgator.in/" aria-invalid="true"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">Hostgator</span></a> offers:</p>
<p><img src="https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/ZiAw6hev0QzWzBqe3bP0YrkqSZQ5ufdsEPbCQu1GvenMXAzHV_sip6Z5muooe57HEDi8Fo7yPb9c2gP2Swd93IIyZyRk2XWPWBN4g545y92hk-fzJ-mlULX43IBe5EgWnqGssn4w=s1600"></p>
<p>On average, the cost to host your eCommerce website in India will be around<strong> ?2000 to ?10,000</strong> a year. (a minimum)</p>
<p>As you are new, you can choose to go for a shared server as it won’t crack your budget. A dedicated server is expensive but offers the best performance. Once you get to see some sales and profit, you can migrate to your own VPS server.</p>
<ol start="4">
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<h2><a id="Professional eCommerce Photography" name="Professional eCommerce Photography"></a>Professional eCommerce Photography</h2>
</li>
</ol>
<p>“Can’t I just add my own photos? Is a photographer really necessary?”</p>
<p>Well yes but only if you are a photographer yourself.</p>
<p>There is a new demand for product photographers these days and they live up to their reputation. If you have a product line to sell, you need a professional touch and that is what <a href="https://www.devigntech.com/blog/things-ecommerce-website-customers-want"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">every customer expects from an ecommerce store</span></a>.</p>
<p>Hiring photographers in India for your eCommerce website can cost <strong>?10,000 to ?50,000</strong> depending upon the number of products, shots per product, images for the cover, carousel and more.</p>
<p><strong>Pro-tip:</strong></p>
<p>One thing you can do is to hire the same photographer if you are planning to launch multiple products down the line. That way, you can negotiate for a better deal.</p>
<ol start="5">
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<h2><a id="Web Design" name="Web Design"></a>Web Design</h2>
</li>
</ol>
<p>You won’t have any doubt here. A professional web designer is super necessary.</p>
<p>The price will highly fluctuate as there are a lot of factors to consider. From the platform to their team, the cost of hiring a web designer will vary.</p>
<p>The bare minimum price to build your eCommerce website in India would be <strong>?30,000</strong> but it can climb to six figures depending upon your ideas. If you want customized designs, long term support and have a ton of products in hand, it will end up with a big budget.</p>
<p>WordPress and Shopify are great options to create web design. <a href="https://www.devigntech.com/ecommerce-web-development-services-pune-india"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">Hire an ecommerce development company</span></a> that are specialists in what they do. WordPress has WooCommerce, a plugin to offer great support for business owners. Shopify is exclusively meant for online businesses that offer premium features.</p>
<p><strong>Pro-tip:</strong></p>
<p>If the designer’s profile sasys “Wix designer/Squarespace designer”, skip them. Read my article on my <a href="https://www.devigntech.com/blog/dont-use-diy-website-builders-business"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">DIY website builders are a red flag</span></a> for eCommerce. You will thank me for that.</p>
<ol start="6">
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<h2><a id="Payment Gateway Integration" name="Payment Gateway Integration"></a>Payment Gateway Integration</h2>
</li>
</ol>
<p>You know that you need a payment gateway to support the interaction with your clients. Without one, the entire transaction becomes vulnerable to threats online so customers avoid your site altogether.</p>
<p>When you choose a payment gateway here are some of the features, they offer:</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: unset;">
<li style="list-style-type: disc;">The gateway will support many payment methods from credit cards, debit cards, UPI, and internet banking.</li>
<li style="list-style-type: disc;">The big names use AI algorithms to verify risky orders, verify shipping addresses and offer all round protection during transactions.</li>
<li style="list-style-type: disc;">You have better insights on tracking your orders, get customer support and pay nominal fees for every transaction.</li>
</ul>
<p>There are a lot of players like Razorpay, CC Avenues, and Just Pay in India for eCommerce websites and their pricing can be around <strong>?6000 to ?40,000</strong>. When you choose a provider, you have to be aware of the setup fee and the transaction fee.</p>
<p>Some providers have zero setup fees so you can sign up for free. Later, they levy a transaction fee of 1% to 2.5%. Just like any other service company, they will have packages that suit different businesses so choose yours and negotiate for the best deal.</p>
<p>To have a clear picture on how the costs look, <a href="https://devigntech.com/web-design-cost-calculator"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">use my ecommerce website cost calculator</span></a>.</p>
<ol start="7">
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<h2><a id="Logistics Service" name="Logistics Service"></a>Logistics Service</h2>
</li>
</ol>
<p>Now, time to dispatch your orders.</p>
<p>By this time, your eCommerce website is designed and hosted. You are about to receive your first order. That being said, you need support to deliver them.</p>
<p>Logistics services offer more than just delivering packages. They assist in cash on delivery (CoD), print labels and invoices, and an account manager to support you.</p>
<p>So how much does they charge?</p>
<p>Most platforms don't charge for the registration. You will undergo a verification and then you start shipping. The charges apply for the number of deliveries you make, starting at <strong>?25 per kg</strong>.</p>
<p>You can check out <strong>Instashipin</strong>, <strong>Bluedart</strong>, and <strong>Delhivery </strong>as they dominate the market now.</p>
<ol start="8">
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<h2><a id="Messaging Service" name="Messaging Service"></a>Messaging Service</h2>
</li>
</ol>
<p>As a customer, I want to know that you are there for me whenever things go sideways.</p>
<p>More than that, I want quicker responses and a clear explanation so that I can trust you to make another purchase.</p>
<p>Live chat bots have proven to be useless as the responses are not customized to the issue and offer delayed responses. In fact, <a href="https://www.superoffice.com/blog/live-chat-support-study/"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">21% of companies</span></a> don’t respond to customers through live chat at all.</p>
<p>The alternative? Go for SMS services or set up <a href="https://www.businessinsider.com/the-messaging-app-report-2015-11?IR=T"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">messenger apps</span></a> for continuous support.</p>
<p>You can send customized messages for new launches, live tracking, updates on their support tickets and much more.</p>
<p><a href="https://www.textlocal.in/bulk-sms-pricing-india/"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">Textlcoal</span></a> is a website where you can set up SMS options to send notifications to your customers. You can get started with just <strong>?295 for 1000 messages</strong>. </p>
<ol start="9">
<li style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<h2><a id="Maintaining Cost" name="Maintaining Cost"></a>Maintaining Cost</h2>
</li>
</ol>
<p>“Wait. My website is up and running fine. What should I spend for now?”</p>
<p>Without proper maintenance, everything falls apart. So does your eCommerce website.</p>
<p>It could be your design, the SEO for your content, tweaking the code to manage glitches. It could be something simple like updating your banner image or integrating a newsletter feature.</p>
<p>Since you will have a relatively new website, you won’t get tangled in website migration and design updates as they cost a lot.</p>
<p>The minor updates include content optimization, technical glitches like dealing with spam mails, tightening up security, and slow website speed.</p>
<p>These can cost anywhere between <strong>?3000 to ?10,000</strong> or more in case you run into unfortunate situations where your website is down or a malicious threat is detected.</p>
<p>Now to sum things up, it would take around <strong>?75,000 to ?3,00,000</strong> depending upon your needs.</p>
<p><strong>Can you build your eCommerce website at a lower price than that?</strong></p>
<p>Yes but remember. This is your business that you will be investing a large portion of your life into. Wouldn’t you want it to be close to perfect?</p>
<p>Going cheap isn’t always the best way if you wish to make good returns online. A well-built eCommerce website is the best one-time investment you can make. </p>
<h3>Want to build your eCommerce website within your budget?</h3>
<p><a href="https://devigntech.com/"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">Gyan Devign Tech Services</span></a> builds professional ecommerce websites for aspiring entrepreneurs like you. Our web design services have helped our clients to achieve their business goals and we never failed to deliver.</p>
<p><a href="https://devigntech.com/contact-IT-software-consultant"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">Contact us now</span></a> and we can discuss your business idea and build that eCommerce website with no hidden costs whatsoever!</p>

    blog_detail => string (10281) "<p><img src="https://devigntech.com/adminpanel/images/why%20add%20ecommerce%...
    $value[1]['blog_detail']
    <p><img src="https://devigntech.com/adminpanel/images/why%20add%20ecommerce%20product%20videos%20for%20higher%20conversions.jpg" alt="ecommerce priduct videos"></p>
<p>Videos speak a lot more than images. In our previous blog, we discussed the <a href="https://devigntech.com/blog/quality-ecommerce-product-images-importance"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">importance of images in the ecommerce industry</span></a>, but attractive photos are table stakes at this point. If you want a skyrocketing start of your business, then you can’t afford to miss the incorporation of videos on your website.</p>
<p>Let’s look at some stats which will shift your focus towards videos, just like me!</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: unset;">
<li style="list-style-type: disc;">One minute of video is equivalent to 1.8 million words.</li>
<li style="list-style-type: disc;">48% of marketers come up with four videos every month</li>
<li style="list-style-type: disc;">Google gives preference to videos. </li>
</ul>
<h2>3 Reasons why to introduce product videos on your e-commerce website?</h2>
<p>You're wrong if you are considering video marketing as an emerging trend. It’s not emerging; it is here to stay everywhere. Many customers like me love to watch product videos to learn more about their features before buying.</p>
<p><img src="https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/YwuLCY4cfk9EIp7ni-wYBcSLLyl6j1Cd8xUfeJO1uDwej2sUZBVdHJcWGyD1nLnrlrU0aRNVYTkE0eSk-Pu8KsgRe5P7NcYxz-76ZLKrS-IYMS8FX5KQCGX451PP_YhXAtI9gd8ehSLu50lOgueBaSQ"></p>
<ul style="list-style-type: unset;">
<li style="list-style-type: disc;"><a href="https://www.invespcro.com/blog/e-commerce-product-videos/#:~:text=73%25%20of%20online%20consumers%20say,website%20that%20feature%20product%20videos."><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">73%</span></a> of customers buy products after watching its video. </li>
<li style="list-style-type: disc;"><a href="https://www.socialmediatoday.com/news/the-importance-of-video-marketing-in-ecommerce-27-stats-you-need-to-know/580216/"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">70%</span></a> of video marketers believe that video accelerates traffic to the website</li>
<li style="list-style-type: disc;"><a href="https://www.builderfly.com/5-reasons-ecommerce-product-videos-will-increase-sales/"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">62%</span></a> of organizations believe that video has greatly boosted their conversion rate.</li>
</ul>
<p>The above stats are self-explanatory to inform you about the importance of product videos, but I would like to bring some more points into the limelight.</p>
<h3><strong>1. Informative Product videos quench all your queries</strong></h3>
<p>Customers never watch product videos to laugh and upvote on YouTube. They want complete information about the product and what they don’t know before buying. For example,</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: unset;">
<li style="list-style-type: disc;">While buying clothes, customers will love to know about its overall look, cloth material and other features.</li>
<li style="list-style-type: disc;">While buying any electronic item, the audience will look for this feature, function and how to use information.</li>
</ul>
<p>Addressing all such answers with a catchy yet informative video will surely help customers make buying decisions. Hence <strong>ecommerce website conversion increases with product videos.</strong></p>
<h3><strong>2. Ecommerce Product Videos attract more organic traffic</strong></h3>
<p>Many <strong>e-commerce development companies in India</strong> get visitors to their stores through organic traffic. Google judges the quality of a website through its bounce rate. Hence coming up with high-quality yet informative videos on your website will increase the stickiness of customers, accelerating the traffic in your store. </p>
<p><img src="https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/NPKSup5smZWAefotu-tDbNj2cDa7AnegaElzxG0DSPCuwm2zcJybwzzUYrb0UHUOymyQLgGTizLfSD3h-00hz59UvU047diYa99skGrK4QPnLSiMuJvDlckt8WIHKezw0ruaTFbPLIiCRse8tnZMb3Y"></p>
<p>Now, let me introduce you to two major brands which are doing great in their business. Zappos and Amazon. These  brands use product videos to grab more audience and to make buyers completely satisfied with the product before making a buying decision.</p>
<p>You can check the below video to know how they are using effective videos to convince the customers.</p>
<p><img src="https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/kWbhpRxoObLZoJashLahldsarc4D76ZBN5GqVQVI6NZnFayfqdskMCanEcKQYBvX2EpHGHlahNVbTtEeRvUD6a9eN7sAKkCGnnPWiCahTua7Jk7525-kdNJKoxI9Ou7vZbLeXZxxRiG15Aax15Zq7L8"></p>
<p>Source:  <a href="https://www.zappos.com/p/birkenstock-arizona-birko-flor-brown-birko-flor/product/7209856/color/541674"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">Zappos</span></a></p>
<p><img src="https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/9LZNsSab6xrGDpi36s21BkG3-LuNSLcDnhVlI4yJFTxXDFXwAW9zP9UofOuRXY7jrAftC41y1dKFlwTjWNF5ADzDWGTHX3N6W3kOXyoQ_TtGeSyQX3h1_SSMQEYwtmMYybPCBdnXxtUlvBrNAK_ZHF4"></p>
<p>Source: Amazon</p>
<p>I was reading an ecommerce conversion stats, it states that, <strong>44% of consumers say they would purchase more products from an ecommerce website that features product videos</strong>. If you are smart to implement product videos, there is a definite increase in trust factor among your potential buyers.</p>
<h3><strong>3. Product Videos are virtual demos of the product</strong></h3>
<p>You or your team can’t entertain each customer personally. Hence, do it virtually with videos. For instance, if I am looking for a fitness center nearby and after research work I stop on a local gym website. On that website, I found their vision and mission. I may love it, but this will not convince me. Further, I found a video on that website which let me know what I can expect after joining their fitness club.</p>
<p>Bingo! That’s what I want to know, and I will be satisfied then.</p>
<p>Such videos give buyers a better understanding of the product and its look.</p>
<h2>What do Ecommerce Company Owners say? Let’s know their views on product videos</h2>
<p>As per <a href="https://www.bain.com/globalassets/noindex/2020/bain_report_how_india_shops_online.pdf"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">a joint report</span></a> from Bain & Company and Flipkart, consumption of videos in tier 2 and other towns has increased four times. Thus many e-commerce companies have started using influencer videos of their product to increase the stickiness of customers on their websites.</p>
<p>E-commerce platforms like Simsim and Bulbul have started using videos instead of images to introduce their market products.</p>
<p>As per Mr Sachin Bhatia, founder of <a href="https://bulbul.tv/"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">Bulbul</span></a>, ‘<em>People who have recently started using the online platform from the last 2-3 years rely mostly on product videos. We want to converse with them in their language, which is possible only through videos. My focus is to make the shopping experience more real. Shopping is a social experience, and one should make it interactive</em>.</p>
<p>Mr Amit Bagaria, the co-founder of Simsim, another video-led-e-commerce company,<em> said that making our website more conversational through audio-visuals and putting less text on it is one of the pillars he and his co-founders Mr Kunal Suri and Mr Saurabh Vashishtha founded Simsim</em>.</p>
<p><em>“We firmly believe that today’s new user base needs unique audio-visual platforms to serve them better</em>”. </p>
<h2>It’s time to convert videos into Shoppable videos.</h2>
<p>Shoppable videos are short videos that tell you about the product. It allows you to buy whatever you have seen in the video.</p>
<p>Sometimes the main reason for buying any product is the ‘thing’ which stays in your mind. And that so-called ‘thing’ is nothing but the video of that product.</p>
<p>Kaizad Hansotia, CEO of <a href="https://www.goswirl.live/"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">SWIRL</span></a>, says, ‘<em>We think every brand which finds it difficult to convince customers should focus on the video platform. It’s all about customer engagement with the product and conversion of their interest into sales</em>.</p>
<p>This brand has come up with a video platform containing live and interactive videos which customers can watch before buying</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: unset;">
<li style="list-style-type: disc;">Videos give customers a lot of product information, which otherwise will be available only at stores.</li>
<li style="list-style-type: disc;">Videos help brands to touch huge audiences located in different locations.</li>
<li style="list-style-type: disc;">An influencing video can change the buyers’ perspective toward a product, and they can buy it immediately.</li>
</ul>
<h2> </h2>
<h2>Wrap Up!</h2>
<p>In the entire post, you might have gone through many points directed toward the bright future of <strong>ecommerce product videos</strong> for the ecommerce sector.</p>
<p>Informative videos will help many of your customers know about the product and your company. Videos will play a pivotal role in customers' decision-making process and bring them closer to conversion.</p>
<p>Are you looking to build your ecommerce store, check out my  <a href="https://devigntech.com/ecommerce-web-development-services-pune-india"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 126, 95); text-decoration: underline;">ecommerce development services</span></a> page and know about the process and work samples.</p>
